title: SPORTY  Watch Face
summary: BL3CK FACE: Digital watch face for android Wear
description: A new digital face that combine ultraclear infos with design elements of professional sport-watch.Optimized for Round and Square watches (tested on LG GWatchR, LG GWatch, Asus ZenWatch, Moto360)Android Wear 5.0x CompliantWatch face features:★           Digital time★           Wear battery indicator★           Phone battery indicator★           Customizable text logo in background (via companion app)★           Customizable marker colors in background (via companion app)★           Date with month and day★           Absolute bl3ck background to preserve battery drain★           Dimmed mode almost the same as normal viewMore•  Visit our exclusive Android Wear faces collection for Android Wear on the Play Store LINK DEV PLAYSTORE•  Please let us know if you like to have any other faces (analog, digital or both) to be added to our selection. Designed and crafted in Italy by Stefano&Riccardo
descriptionHTML:
A new digital face that combine ultraclear infos with design elements of professional sport-watch.
Optimized for Round and Square watches (tested on LG GWatchR, LG GWatch, Asus ZenWatch, Moto360)
Android Wear 5.0x Compliant

Watch face features:
★ Digital time
★ Wear battery indicator
★ Phone battery indicator
★ Customizable text logo in background (via companion app)
★ Customizable marker colors in background (via companion app)
★ Date with month and day
★ Absolute bl3ck background to preserve battery drain
★ Dimmed mode almost the same as normal view
More
• Visit our exclusive Android Wear faces collection for Android Wear on the Play Store LINK DEV PLAYSTORE
• Please let us know if you like to have any other faces (analog, digital or both) to be added to our selection.
Designed and crafted in Italy by Stefano&Riccardo
comments: Finally, a Great Digital Watch Face Long time Android wear user and this may be my first review for a watch face. I have looked for a long time for a basic, digital watch face that resembles something like you would find one Fenix or Suunto. Finally, I found this. So far I love it. Only request I would make is a few more color options for the dial and time. But it is already 5 star material.
Seconds Please add a seconds indicator,  maybe the red arrow at bottom.  Also the face does not work on more than one watch at the same time.
No interactive options Great easy to read face, but I wish the headings under the time were functional instead of being purely aesthetic.
Near perfect Nice and easy to read digital watch face. You'd be surprised how hard it's been to find one for Android wear.
More features By far my fav face but it lacks the compass feature. Also another widget  under time and alt/Baro would be cool. Style is identical to my suunto core

Great Watch Face This is easily one of my favorite watch faces since it makes my Moto 360 look like a Suunto Core watch!  I love it and really like the phone battery percentage and the watch battery percentage indicators!
recentChanges: - New Minimal Dimmed Mode font Size
